description: This project is a comprehensive cybersecurity solution that focuses on detecting phishing websites and analyzing DDoS attacks through simulation. It combines Machine Learning, Real-Time Web Application Monitoring, and Load Balancerbased attack simulation to create an end-to-end security framework.

Comprehensive quantitative analysis of global anti-money laundering risks across 203 countries using advanced statistical methods and machine learning. Provides evidence-based policy frameworks for international AML/CFT cooperation, regional coordination strategies, and strategic intervention targeting.

The ECG Analysis and Classification Project is an end-to-end framework for detecting cardiac conditions automatically from electrocardiogram (ECG) signals using machine learning and deep learning techniques.  Built around the PTB Diagnostic ECG Database, this project integrates three main modules:  Data Processing and Visualization  signal cleanin

PhoenixAI: Revolutionizing test automation with AI.  Our intelligent framework uses machine learning, NLP, and computer vision to create unbreakable tests for UI and API, reducing maintenance and maximizing coverage.

This repository contains my personal projects and experiments in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. It includes hands-on practice with algorithms, model training, data preprocessing, and deep learning frameworks. My goal is to build a strong foundation in AI/ML by experimenting, learning, and sharing my progress with the community.

Advanced NLP and LLM-based framework for analyzing Sri Lankan Reddit discussions: combining data collection, machine learning, deep learning, and transformer models to extract thematic, sentiment, and policy insights.

This project centers on developing an analytical framework to characterize and differentiate between various breeds of cattle and buffalo using Machine Learning (ML) techniques. The goal is to move beyond traditional, subjective methods of breed classification by leveraging data-driven insights for more accurate identification
Minerva is a framework for training machine learning models for researchers.
Framework for computing Machine Learning algorithms in Python using Dask and RAPIDS AI.
Machine Learning Framework for Crystal Energy Prediction
TinyTorch is a minimalist framework for building machine learning systems from scratchfrom tensors to systems.
This repository contains the supplementary materials for the paper: Machine Learning Framework for Speech Intelligibility Prediction using Binaural Room Impulse Responses (Alfian et al., 2025)

A machine-learningdriven, attack-phaseaware vulnerability prioritization framework integrating CVSS, EPSS, MITRE ATT&CK, and the Unified Cyber Kill Chain (UCKC) to compute dynamic risk scores with adaptive weighting and SHAP explainability.
PArallel Distributed Deep LEarning: Machine Learning Framework from Industrial Practice &
A machine learning and Monte Carlo framework for scenario-based geopolitical analysis
Repositrio com diferos estudos sobre machine learning, conceitos de Python como POO, frameworks como Django e mais
Interpretable Machine Learning Framework for Designing High Ionic Conductivity in Low-Temperature Lithium-Ion Battery Electrolytes
Federated Multi-Task Learning Framework for Privacy-Preserving Predictive Maintenance in CNC Machines

This project implements a Supervised Machine Learning (ML) framework to accurately predict the cost of an Electric Vehicle (EV) based on its key features and specifications. This is fundamentally a regression problem, aiming to determine a continuous value (price) from a set of input variables (features).

Attention-guided deep learning framework for multi-class brain tumor classification using MRI scans. Combines EfficientNetB3 with CBAM for high accuracy (99.29%) and integrates Explainable AI (HiResCAM) for visual interpretability of predictions.
Explainable Machine Learning Framework for Credit Risk Assessment
A framework that uses preprocessing and multiple machine learning models to collect data and predict economic crises for countries around the world.

CryptoMarket Regime Classifier is a machine learning framework that detects market regimes (Trend, Range, Squeeze, etc.) in crypto markets using multi-timeframe data and Hidden Markov Models. The project provides plug-and-play labeled datasets and trained models (HMM + LSTM) for downstream strategy development, position sizing, and risk management.
Predicting Gene Expression Divergence between Nested Genes in Human and Mouse Species and two Species of Drosophila using PredIcting eXpression dIvergence (PiXi), a Machine Learning Framework

End-to-end computational platform for pharmaceutical-grade cancer biomarker discovery. Integrates multi-omics data, machine learning, and clinical validation frameworks for precision oncology applications.

An acausal modeling framework for automatically parallelized scientific machine learning (SciML) in Julia. A computer algebra system for integrated symbolics for physics-informed machine learning and automated transformations of differential equations

Portfolio of 8 machine learning projects completed through the UT Austin x Great Learning 7-month postgraduate program. Demonstrates proficiency in Python, ML algorithms, ANN, CNN, NLP and AI development frameworks.

A machine learning framework using Logistic Regression, Random Forest, and XGBoost to detect credit card fraud in real time. Built on the Kaggle dataset, it delivers scalable, explainable, and business-ready risk scoring for banks and financial institutions.
A Python framework for machine learning experiments in industrial machinery fault diagnosis through vibration analysis.

A comprehensive checkpoint management and experiment tracking system for machine learning models. Intelligent model checkpointing with automated experiment tracking, performance analytics, and training resumption. Built for production ML workflows with support    for PyTorch, TensorFlow, JAX, and custom model frameworks.

FRIF Sentinel is a fraud detection framework combining machine learning and graph analytics to uncover organized fraud rings. It models temporal and network relationships among cards, merchants, and devices, prioritizes interventions, and forecasts financial impactreducing false positives and improving detection efficiency.
This repository contains a simple To-Do app made with a Next.js framework and a FastAPI connection to a Machine Learning model, made in preparation for the Junction 2025 hackathon.

A hybrid machine learning framework for short-term forecasting of Finlands aFRR (Automatic Frequency Restoration Reserve) up-regulation needs. Combines weather, market, and consumption data to predict grid balancing demand using classifierregressor ensembles for improved accuracy and insight.

QuantFolio is a C#-based multi-asset portfolio management framework that integrates data collection, cleaning, optimization, backtesting, and visualization. It supports machine learning models, risk analysis, and customizable strategies, with a modern GUI for building, testing, and comparing investment portfolios.

A fully autonomous AI-driven financial intelligence framework for real-time transaction analysis, anomaly detection, predictive analytics, and cognitive insights. Built with Next.js, machine learning, secure pipelines, and automated workflows for modern intelligent finance systems.
An open-source Python framework for hybrid quantum-classical machine learning.
An Open Source Machine Learning Framework for Everyone

Welcome to my project! Here I developed a Python framework for AI-driven risk modeling, using Restricted Boltzmann Machines (RBMs) for probability distribution learning, Monte Carlo simulations for scenario testing, and advanced statistical techniques to evaluate loan default risk and portfolio losses. Includes visualization dashboards for decision
NeXt4ACP is a novel stacked framework that integrates both machine learning and deep learning components for accurate ACP identification.

This project focuses on building a multi-model ransomware detection framework using both classical Machine Learning (ML) and **Deep Learning (DL) techniques.   The goal is to detect ransomware activity including zero-day variants across diverse, real-world datasets with a focus on binary (benign vs. ransomware) and family-level classification
Data for the paper "A Machine Learning Framework for Harvesting and Harmonizing Cultural and Touristic Data", published in the "Information" Journal/MDPI
Open-source machine learning framework for Java. Designed with speed and lightweight in mind.
Predict football match outcomes using the W-5 Multi-Agent AI Consensus Framework, achieving high accuracy with a blend of AI and machine learning techniques.

brpc is an Industrial-grade RPC framework using C++ Language, which is often used in high performance system such as Search, Storage, Machine learning, Advertisement, Recommendation etc. "brpc" means "better RPC".
A unified machine learning framework for thematic, emotional, and semantic analysis of Clarissa and Septimus narrative intertextuality in Mrs Dalloway.

This project develops neural-network surrogate models for fast, accurate European option pricing under stochastic volatility frameworks. Traditional methods like Monte Carlo simulations are computationally expensive. The goal is to use machine learning models, trained on synthetic data, for orders-of-magnitude faster pricing with similar accuracy.

This repository contains the implementation of a lightweight machine-learning framework for early detection of harmful or misleading visual-textual Internet memes. The system is designed to be reproducible using only free resources (Google Colab) and to serve as a fast, low-cost baseline suitable for short scientific publications.
Hyperparameter optimization algorithms for use in the MLJ machine learning framework

AI & ML portfolio showcasing projects in Machine Learning, Deep Learning, NLP, Computer Vision, and Data Analytics. Includes work on sentiment analysis, heart disease prediction, image detection, time series forecasting, fraud detection, and generative AI tools using Python and ML frameworks.

A full-stack AI-powered stock market prediction platform built using Django REST Framework (DRF) for the backend and React.js for the frontend. This project leverages machine learning models to analyze historical stock data and predict future trends, helping users make data-driven investment decisions.
Foam-Agent: An end-to-end, composable multi-agent framework for automating CFD simulations in OpenFOAM. NeurIPS 2025 Machine Learning and the Physical Sciences Workshop.

modular template for building Zero-Knowledge Machine Learning systems  ZKML Blueprint is an open-source framework designed to help developers, researchers, and builders create verifiable machine learning systems using zero-knowledge proofs. It provides a structured reference architecture, example circuits, model workflows, and tools for integrating

This repository contains a collection of Python programs and Jupyter notebooks focusing on Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) algorithms. It covers implementations, experiments, and hands-on code examples using popular libraries and frameworks in Python.
An orchestration framework for End-to-End Machine Learning Serving with Resource Optimization on Heterogeneous Edge

An AI-powered virtual mental health support system developed using the RASA framework that provides personalized therapy through chatbot interactions. It leverages NLP and machine learning to understand user emotions, offer tailored guidance, and recommend professionals.The system achieved 100% accuracy in conversation and action-level evaluations.
Developed a comprehensive weather pattern analysis framework by integrating machine learning models with geospatia

This project contains a set of **Jupyter notebooks** to help students and data scientists deeply understand and visualize the *four main classification metrics* used in machine learning: **Accuracy, Precision, Recall, and F1 Score**.

Build a credit risk prediction model and apply SHAP and LIME to explain global and local decisions. Compare both methods, analyze discrepancies, and produce an interpretable, regulator-friendly explanation framework for fair and transparent loan approvals.
A modular machine learning framework for budget execution & data analysis built in Python with Scikit, XGBoost, PyTorch, and TensorFlow.
A machine learning framework analyzing 80k+ support interactions to predict customer satisfaction (CSAT) and optimize agent allocation.
An evaluation framework for machine learning models simulating high-throughput materials discovery.

Machine Learning-powered multi-asset portfolio risk and return prediction framework. Combines advanced technical indicators, rolling statistics, and feature engineering to build data-driven quantitative finance models for robust portfolio optimization and risk analysis.

A web application that predicts disease likelihood from patient input using a machine learning model and exposes the model via a Django web app (REST API + web UI).   Built with Python, scikit-learn, pandas (model), and Django + Django REST Framework (backend & API). Ideal as a small end-to-end demo for healthcare/ML portfolios.
This repository has my projects towards quantitative finance, which includes Machine Learning, Mathematical Models, coded using Python and its frameworks.
A framework for performing active learning for training machine-learned interatomic potentials.
A differentiable ray tracer using the PyTorch machine-learning framework in Python.
Data and Codes for Integrated Design Framework for Titanium Aluminides Through Interpretable Machine Learning

ChatGPT said:  An AI-driven framework that optimizes crop selection and water management using climate, soil, and rainfall data. It leverages machine learning to recommend sustainable, region-specific crops and predict water availability, promoting climate-resilient and resource-efficient farming practices.
Machine learning framework for predicting Service Life Ratio (SLR) of recycled electrochemical membranes using scenario-based simulations and Random Forest regression.
Folax (Finite Operator Learning with JAX) is a framework for solving and optimizing PDEs by integrating machine learning with numerical methods in computational mechanics.
Machine learning of metal-organic framework design for band gap energy prediction
Machine Learning

A fully manual neural network implementation developed for my university project. This project includes weight initialization, forward propagation, backpropagation, sigmoid activation, gradient computation, and parameter updates implemented from scratch without using machine learning frameworks.

A machine learning framework that predicts book popularity ratings by extracting sentiment and emotional features from narrative   text. Uses NLP techniques (VADER sentiment analysis, NRC emotion lexicon) combined with RNN/LSTM models to analyze 1,160+ Project   Gutenberg eBooks and predict Goodreads ratings
Machine Learning Pose Detection Framework for Suspicious Activity Detection
A machine learning-based video super resolution and frame interpolation framework. Est. Hack the Valley II, 2018.
A performant and dynamic MachineLearning framework written in .NET

Machine learning framework predicting U.S. county-level opioid cost per capita (20132023) by integrating Pharmacy Benefit Management (PBM) levers and Social Determinants of Health (SDOH). Includes data pipelines, simulation code, and reproducible figures.

This project develops a distributed Machine Learning framework. It's based on a client-server architecture, distributing the tasks using different threads. The clients are able to insert datasets, train different models, evaluate their metrics and inference with them. Mainly over the salary from a Undergraduate/Postgraduate/Phd students.
This repository contains the codes for the paper: "A thermoinformational framework for the description of neuropsychological systems through machine learning "
A Machine Learning framework for predicting cardiovascular disease outcomes across publicly available four benchmark datasets and a lung cancer dataset.

scikit-learn_bench benchmarks various implementations of machine learning algorithms across data analytics frameworks. It currently support the scikit-learn, DAAL4PY, cuML, and XGBoost frameworks for commonly used machine learning algorithms.

Genex is a full-stack application designed to assist doctors in predicting autoimmune diseases and managing personalized treatment plans. The system uses machine learning on patient gene expression data and integrates a digital twin framework to simulate drug-gene and drug-drug interactions, helping clinicians make informed therapeutic decisions.

Machine Learning framework for PWR abnormality detection using an optimized Random Forest model with SMOTE balancing and Grid Search tuning. Includes full evaluation, ROC-AUC, confusion matrix, feature importance, and reproducible code from the research publication.
MLPro - The Integrative Middleware Framework for Standardized Machine Learning in Python

A security framework for Hinglish chatbots that detects and prevents prompt injection attacks using rule-based and machine learning methods. It preprocesses code-mixed text, identifies malicious inputs, and ensures safe, reliable, and real-time AI interactions in bilingual environments.
This repository presents a BERT-based framework, which is a SOTA transformer-based machine learning model for NLP, for early detection of mental health issues through language analysis.
A machine learning project that predicts visa approval status using applicant data. Built using Python, scikit-learn following the CRISP-DM framework.
a hybrid graphspectral machine-learning framework to predict triplet lifetimes

In this study, we introduce a novel machine learning based framework that predicts austenitic grain growth behaviour directly from chemical composition and process conditions, utilizing a comprehensive dataset of 1039 experimentally validated samples. Among various algorithms tested, the XGBoost model demonstrated exceptional predictive capability

Mapping Alternate Scenarios of Forest Intactness (MASFI) is a cloud-based machine learning framework. It uses XGBoost regression and remote sensing data such as GEDI LiDAR to create high-resolution maps and statistics, supporting protected area planning and management.

A comprehensive platform for building, training, and deploying intelligent NLU chatbots powered by advanced Machine Learning algorithms and the RASA framework. Features a Next.js frontend and a Python dual-mode backend

LEO CDP is an open-source, AI-first Customer Data Platform for building customizable, self-hosted, privacy-friendly CDP infrastructure. It unifies data collection, enables real-time analytics, audience segmentation, and personalized marketing  powered by big data and machine learning.

Smart Flight Booking App is an intelligent flight reservation platform built with React.js and Django REST Framework that uses machine learning for price prediction, enabling users to seamlessly search, compare, and book flights through a secure, responsive, and visually appealing interface.

Machine learning framework to analyze correlations in PrizePicks betting. Includes data pipeline for player stats, regression and ML models for correlation, and visualizations to support strategy simulations using public sports databases.

A collection of machine learning projects and experiments covering end-to-end ML pipelines, from model development to deployment. Focused on practical AI engineering, ML frameworks and MLOps practices.

SafeNet Ecosystem is an advanced, cross-platform phishing detection framework powered by modern AI models. It is designed to protect users across web, desktop, and mobile environments by identifying suspicious URLs, emails, messages, and app activities in real time.
